name: .JTV File Extension
summary: Learn about .JTV files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video recording created by JRiver Media Center, a multimedia playback and online streaming application; stores captured video such as Internet television programs; saved in a proprietary format, which can be played back in Media Center.

content: JTV files are used in a manner similar to recordings on a DVR device. Users can automatically record TV shows and then watch them later.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
